Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review: Sound quality ROCKS especially if you like BASS, battery life is good and the comfort is top notch. Build quality could be a little better for the price but they are sturdy enough for me. An included wall charger would have been nice.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: wireless, sturdy, comfy
Cons: expensive
I was iffy about buying these headphones because of the price. I was going to buy the soloHD instead but hey wireless (for me) is better. I use theswhile workin out at the gym & gardening. The sound is awesome, the bass is clear crisp , I'm very satisfied with this purchase. Not thrilled with price but owell , I'm happy with my wireless beats :)

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: Sound quality is great, easy set up.
Cons: Controls are hard to identify by touch when wearing the headphones.
Good sound balance, though the bass is a little fat. Unlike most IR wireless headphones, there is very little background noise. Max. range from souce is about 30 feet. Easy to adjust the headphones for a comfortable fit. Batteries last longer than expected. Will play music at very high levels with negligible audible distortion.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: Great sound w/o the wires
Cons: Nothing so far
I've had my Beats by Dr. Dre Wireless for almost a month and I'm quite satisfied. The sound quality is noticibly better than my last wireless headphones. They also seem to hold a charge much longer. The fold-up design makes them easy to pack for trips. The headphones were easy to set up. I'm enjoying these headphones a lot and would recommend them to anyone willing to pay a little more for quality.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: Blutooth and design
Cons: Battery Life
The sound quality is not outstanding. It's good, but not great. Battery is horrible. Couldn't last a subway ride to the office and a ride back home.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: Bluetooth, sound quality
Cons: a little bulky
These are the best headphones you'll ever own. The range is excellent - I can be 30+ feet away with no trouble hearing. Quality is top-notch. I never realized how much was missing from mp3's with my old earbuds. They are easy to charge and battery life is great.
I didn't realize until I got them home that a cord is also provided. that's a nice bonus when traveling and bluetooth on the plane is a no-no, or when you don't have a charger handy. They are large and do get in the way sometimes, but that should be expected. They fold for storage - that's nice. I am able to wear them without discomfort for 3 or 4 hours at least - I haven't really pushed it past that.
They also block ambient noise quite well considering ... they are not isolation headphones. You don't have to play them very loud to hear your tunes if you are not in a quiet area
You will never regret buying these. They are amazing and worth the $. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: Wireless, Bluetooth, Easy Set up, Stytle
Cons: Price, Needs a bit more louder sound
The headphones are nice! I originally bought the Silver Dre Studio's. They were too big and they honestly hurt my ears, as far as comfort. My ears are big. To be honest when I tried the Studio's I was expecting WAY more sound and just to blow me away, but it lacked something.
I then exchanged the Studio's for These Wireless Solo's, I dont regret it. To me they seem bigger then the Solo's, but everyone says its the same size. The wireless feature is my biggest PLUS! I love it. I linked it to my Iphone and my Macbook Pro. Sounds is sick. I wish it was a bit louder, but its enough to not hear your surroundings. If you have big ears or dont want the bigger studios (and you can afford ... it) get these. Great Buy expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: Excellent sound quality, great phone bluetooth device, easy to sync with everything
Cons: Everything is great.
I have now synced the headphones to my Samsung Galaxy Note, Asus Transformer Prime, Imac, Motoactv Watch, it all works perfectly. The sound is absolutely perfect. I can walk across my house and still pick up the bluetooth signal. The sound quality is perfect when I use it with my phone for a bluetooth headset. Do not hesitate buy it right away.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: The sound, wireless,
Cons: The price, but I can
The b on the side of the headphones is banging! I take these things everywhere. From hip hop to r&b to rock to jazz, everything sounds outstanding. I was a little weary of the price, but I got over that real fast. Not to mention, these headphones are wireless and I can use them with all my bluetooth devices.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.ReviewTitle: Not going back to something inferior now.
Item.Review:
Pros: SOUND
Cons: High gloss finish means be gentle.
I was not trying to ever get a pair of 300 dollar headphones BUT I live an active lifestyle in NYC and this was just an investment I had to make. I needed to be WIRE FREE for exercise and while commuting. This made sense. I was not expecting the amazing quality of SOUND that you get from these. You will "re-love" all your favorite songs. I have an EVO with beats built in so I know not eveytone has that perfect combo but I have tried them on an I phone and it is still AMAZING SOUND. The battery does what it says about ten ours straight or broken up. Charges quickly in an hour. The fit is good, there is a real good cushion that is what touches your head and kind of secures it to you so they're not flopping everywhere. They lo ... ok so hot and everyone always asks "where is the WIRE!" LOL. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: Bluetooth
Cons: price and sound quality
I bought these mainly because I wanted a pair of wireless headphones. I like my music to sound high quality as well, and I had heard that Beats are pretty awesome. So I bought these, tried them for a few days, and brought them back to the store, very disappointed. The sound quality was average at best, and the bass was overpowering (not in a good way). For $300 headphones I expected much better. I understand that Bluetooth might take away from the quality, but seriously, if that's the case then lower the cost. I went back and bought a pair of Sony XBA-1's for less than a third of the price of these and they sound 10 times better.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to pair with iPhone and iPad.
Cons: It's a bit over priced
The sound quality is exellent and the Bluetooth works great! I also like the fact that the unit can also be plugged in. Very easily adjustable to fit perfectly. The sound quality is very good as it should be for a high- end unit and the controls on the right earpiece are very easy to use.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: Sound quality, comfortbility, design, durability
Cons: Price can be overwhelming for some
First and foremost, if the $400 dollar price tag isn't a option - then the Beats Pro is the only option to go.
I just bought my Pro headphones today and absolutely love them. The sound quality is very solid and the headphones are well built and doesn't feel cheap. The bass is what really caught my attention about the Beats Pro, the bass is deep and rich and still retain a good treble and overall great listening experience.
They fit quite comfortable on my head and I can wear them for hours at a time and not feel frustrated with the bulkiness. I'm a frequent traveler and these are my daily headphones (as I own two more pair of Beats by Dr. Dre headphones too). I will s ... trongly recommend these to a friend.
If you are a fan of music and love to travel then the Beats Pro are a great option despite its price tag. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: Sound quality, Button placement, Bluetooth range, Ease of use
Cons: No tightness adjustment, Fingerprints,
I use these on a daily basis in my house. I can listen to music from my iPhone, leave it plugged in around the middle of my house and walk around doing whatever I need to without missing a beat. The one thing I really like about these is the placement of the controls. They are intuitive and easy to locate without having to remove the headphones . I've tried many other options (I'm somewhat of a headphone junkie) and I always seem to hit the wrong button or click one too many times or not enough. With the Beats I just reach my hand up to my ear, find either the raised bump, or the big circle in the middle to pause, skip forward or back, adjust the volume or turn it ... off. I can listen in bed again with the phone plugged in to conserve battery and when I'm done just turn off the headphones and sleep without having to get up and go plug in the phone to charge overnight.
The only mild complaints I have with these headphones are that there is no way to adjust how tight they fit on your head and my ears do get a little sore. The big comfy ear pieces do mitigate that somewhat There is a length adjustment. They are so much of a fingerprint magnet that a cleaning cloth is included in the box. I'm not sure if it's a phone issue or a Beats issue, but if I'm listening to music with bluetooth and I get a phone call the sound just stops. The song keeps playing but no sound comes through. I end up having to reset the bluetooth connection and then it works fine. When I've used the cord with the mic for phone calls everything works perfectly and I get no complaints about sound on the other end. I've used these every day for a couple of months now and overall I'm very satisfied with the purchase. I do think they are overpriced, but most brand names are. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: Great sound.
Cons: Shoddy workmanship and POOR customer support!
BUYER BEWARE:
I purchased a pair of Beats Wireless Headphones on 2/16/2012 from the San Francisco Apple Store, upon recommendation from one of their sales associates. See, I've had trouble in the past with wired models as inevitably one of the speakers would cease to work due to a short. As the Beats Wireless Headphones do not feature a prominent cord and, due to the Apple Representative's recommendation, I took the plunge. Additionally, I was assured by the Apple Rep that the headphones had a year long warranty with the manufacturer. The headphones cost roughly $300 once tax was added in, FYI. Expensive for sure but with such a high cost comes a reasonable expectation of quality workmanship and qua ... lity materials. Since purchasing the headphones, I have used them primarily on my commute to and from work at Stanford University with the main action of putting the headphones onto my head via the following: pull Beats headphones out of protective carrying case, unfold the headphones, place them onto my head. On 8/4/2012, I went to put the Beats on and as I was lowering them onto my head, the top portion of the headband snapped at a point where screws are placed on the unit (located on the underside of the unit's plastic headband). I was and am shocked that they broke from such a simple action. I immediately contacted Beats Customer Service to complain and seek repair. I described the situation to their agent and she told me to send them in. That Monday, I went to the post office and sent my unit along with all original materials, including original packaging, back to Beats for repair on my own dollar. They received my headphones on Wednesday, 8/8/2012. This morning, 8/10/2012, I have an email from Beats stating that repair and/or replacement has been declined on my order (#367599). The stated reason that the company provided me was as follows: Damage Beyond Reasonable Use. Once seeing this email, I called Beats Customer Service once more only to be told that such damag ... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: Awesome battery life, amazing sound, corded use optional, durable, sweat resistant, crisp/clear call quality
Cons: adjustments needed for different excercise positions
Before deciding to take the plunge and purchase this headset I searched tirelessly for a good review describing their use and durability in a gym setting, I never really found one. I knew beats made a sport type headset but it was in ear and I didn't want to compromise on sound quality, wanting the full experience that over-the-ear provides. I hope this review will help others trying to make that same decision. Beats Wireless has proven itself very capable of handling daily use in a gym setting. I use them 4-5 days a week. I will break this review into three parts; sound, durability, and ease of use. < ... br>SOUND
The most important factor, and I have to say the sound is incredible. It really was like listening to my music for the first time again, which was an awesome experience. The headphones cancel outside noise very well, so I am isolated from distraction when in the gym. I find it easier to focus and increase my intensity when I am lifting while crisp, clear metal blasts my eardrums! Lows and highs are all crisp and defined, you will literally FEEL the base coming from these things. I should also mention that I have tried a few calls on the headset and I have been told I can be heard clearly without distortion, which is much more than I can say for other headsets I have used.
DURABILITY
I should first say there are two things I do to care for my beats. First if they are not on my head they are in their soft carry case, ALWAYS. Secondly, after each workout I wipe them down with a damp paper towel, trying to remove any sweat from the workout. Doing this I have found no damage or wear on my Beats after 4-5 months of steady usage, 4-5 times a week. I notice that no sweat seems to get inside the ear cups, instead running down the flat surface of the cups, so the drivers seem to be perfectly safe from water damage.I have also noticed that the headset will play music for at LEAST 10 hours on a single charge. I get through 5 or more training sessions between charges.
EAS ... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: If the battery runs out, simply connect the mic wire from the headset to the audio source and it works perfectly!!!
Cons: Only comes in one color combination
The fact that I have destroyed hundreds of headsets due to wire entanglements and what not, makes this the perfect headset for me, and many others out there like me..........enjoy!!!

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: Quality
Cons: too pricey, uncomfortable on ears
Beats Wireless Over-the-Ear Headphones maybe one of or the best in the market at present time but it is not there yet for what I want for my Headphones. For the price you pay, it doesn't stand par with it. It is hard on my ears. If I wear it for longer time, my ears start hurting. It is too tight on me. Bottom line, if you can afford the price, this is the best in the market but it is still lacking what I want from my headphone.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: Sound and wireless
Cons: Feels flimsy when folding
I purchased these to use when lifting weights at the gym. They do an excellent job canceling noise around me. The sound quality is much better than I expected. I enjoy these do much I wear them around the house and whenever I want to list to music or anything on my phone for a period of time. The fact that they're wireless makes it even better. The sound is improved some when using the 3.5 cable included but not enough to make me want the wire. These are larger than the Solo but not quite over the ear like the Studio. I debated between these and the Studio since the price is pretty close but these win hands down to avoid the wire and the sound in these are pretty close to the Studio's and better than the Solo's.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: No wires, great battery life
Cons: Sound could be clearer, and you only know battery is low when it dies.
They're a great pair of headphones, good for those of us who despise wires. First assumption is that the sound quality will decrease because they work through Bluetooth, but the sound quality is only lessened minimally and your music is still enjoyable and loud and you won't hear anything around you. I wish i had the luxury of knowing where my battery life stands, instead I only know it needs charging when it dies. They have died on me while on the move which isn't very fun. But overall they're good considering they are wireless and will turn a lot of heads, people will be asking you where you got them.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: Sound
Cons: Very little
I use these in a factory and the sound is outstanding. I love the bluetooth feature as it lets me leave my Android phone plugged in as to not drain the battery. The only drawback is that with the heat in the factory, the headphones become a little uncomfortable, but that's a minor problem. Everything else about this product is outstanding.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: Long battery life, Remarkable distance on wireless
Cons: Nothing
This is what I call a wireless headset, could not have been any better. Its worth every penny. It's an incredible gadget to have, will never regret it. Picks up frequencies some bluetooth can't. Love it. I would recommend it to anyone who's looking for a wireless headset.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: The Bass!
Cons: The price!
Very nice! Use the Beats for the gym, so I won't kill myself anymore with the headphone cable getting caught when I am lifting. Nice bass as well.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: The sound
Cons: Absolutely nothing
I've had quite a few different headphones and I have to say these are the best I've ever owned. The sound quality is amazing. The headphones themselves are light compact and very comfortable. I would suggest these headphones to anyone who cares to hear all the subtle nuances of your music.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review: I have a full collection of Dr Dre beats and these are definitely better than the solo HD. Sound quality is great and the 3.5 mili jack makes it way better also they are not the same size as the solos they are a little bit bigger very comfortable. Really recommend these to any one and the Bluetooth, maintains very good sound quality

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review: By far the best headphones i have bought. Sound is great, even though a lot of people think that because of the buetooth, the sound would lack. But not at all its crisp clear and the bass is almost the same as the studio beats.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: sound, easy set up
Cons: price
my sister bought me this headphones for my birthday and they are better than the solos that i use to have and with the cable on is even better.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.ReviewTitle: One of the best products I have ever bought
Item.Review: I bought my wireless beats over a month ago and I swore I wouldn't write a review until at least a month after and now that it's been over a month, I'm more than happy to say that these beats are possible the greatest things I've ever bought. It says the battery life is about 10 hours and I think they lied, I believe its more, after the first charge when I used them, they lasted me over 2 weeks and I used them daily periodically. The sound is amazing and its true you do lose some quality when it's wireless but the fact that if your battery dies and you can use the wires, the quality goes back to being normal amazingly sounding best headphones ever. And another thing at that, best buy from what I've seen is the only to deliver the wired option and I LOVE it, the option to choose either is a ... mazing and allows it to be able to be used by my laptop and other non-bluetooth items. I've experience solos and studios and I've personally loved the wireless the best, I've had several people come and ask me on the bus where I got them, my opinion and I loved gloating about them, these beats wireless are absoltely amazing and I still use them at least once a day everyday and in over a month I've only charged them 3x's which is very impressive to me. If your looking for great headphones you won't regret, look no further, these are absolutely amazing. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: Sound is great and the best feature is the wireless blue tooth.
Cons: Price
So far I've enjoyed the headphones for both their sound quality and their cordless feature. You have to pay for these though and I'm not convinced they are really worth that much, but there are few alternatives with these features. I tried Bose and while the sound was also high quality they do not have the wireless option so i landed on the Beats.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: Bass, Sound Quality (Wired a bit better,) Battery Life
Cons: Not so Comfortable (my opinion) Fingerprint Magnet
These headphones have WAY more bass than the Studios. BELIEVE ME! Everything about this is better, other than the extremely comfortable Plush on the studios. They handle way more sound and almost never crackle at high volumes. The bluetooth sound is above average, but wired is a bit better. They are really light, and portable.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: Sound quality
Cons: Not as loud in Bluetooth as is in wired connection
I had the mixers they pretty good but after 4 months of having them something went wrong with the cord and they stopped working right so I took them back and got these.....I personally think it's the best buy when getting a pair of beats.....they are comfortable, the sound is good in Bluetooth mode, but they still have a quality sound to them... when you hook up the wired cord these things bang.....they are the best beats out when comparing them all.....if you have a big head they might not be to good for you but other than that they pop.....

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.ReviewTitle: Ok but not great for the price
Item.Review:
Pros: Of course wireless
Cons: Not very comfortable
Sound is great. Good bass not too overpowering. The wireless range is pretty good. Not very comfortable after 2hrs of wearing it and gets hot and hurts because of this no matter how good the headphone is cant use it for an extended period of time.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: Nothing
Cons: I could only get it to connect 5% of the time
The bluetooth was terrible, Even though I had my IPad directly next to my ear phones they would not connect and when they did I would get an error. I would never consider this again
Item.HelpfulCount: 0 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.ReviewTitle: Great sound and easy Bluetooth connection
Item.Review:
Pros: Great sound
Cons: Maybe they could be a little louder and fit a little snugger
Good headphones didn't want to give them an excellent rating because there is always room for improvement but I am really satisfied just wish they were a little cheaper never thought I would pay that much for headphones. You get what you pay for, I had other headphones that were much cheaper and I thought they were good until I put a pair of Beats on. I use them mainly for jogging,cutting grass and sometimes I just use them for the Bluetooth whether driving or cleaning around the house in order to be able to use both hands! Overall I'm happy with the Beats Headphones!

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.ReviewTitle: Totally worth the purchase but a little pricey
Item.Review: I just got the beats by dr. Dre wireless bluetooth headphones, and they are way better than i expected them to be. The bluetooth factor is amaizing for the loss of cords. And the built in mic lets you reciev calls! You can also plug in the included monster cord if it dies and it makes it have better quality. The usb to micro usb cable charges it and i figured out that you can charge it in an apple wall charger. There is very good rich bass, highs, mids, and lows. Overall they are so worth the $280, but that is still a little pricey.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.ReviewTitle: Best so far but room for improvement
Item.Review:
Pros: The sound quality and battery life
Cons: somewhat heavy and hot on ears when working out
I have debated getting these for sometime, I have been using the rocketfish bluetooth headphones for two years, I use headphones only when working out and I usually workout for 2.5 hours a day and I can go through 6 workouts at full volume without having to re-charge. Compared to the rocketfish the sound quality is amazing, what you would expect for the price. It has taken me a week or so to get used to the heavier feel and your ears get hot in them when working out but I just take them off for a second wipe away the sweat and keep going. The only thing that could make them better would be to design them a little more like the rocket fish that go behind your head so they are more us ... er friendly during workouts but other than that I love them, They block out more noise than any other bluetooth headphones so I can stay focused and actually enjoy my music while im working out for a change. If you have the money and are looking for the best bluetooth headphones these are them right now. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.ReviewTitle: Great Sound and Comfortable to wear
Item.Review:
Pros: Sound, Comfortable to wear, ease of use
Cons: nothing so far
I purchased these headphones b/c I wanted a really nice paid of Bluetooth Headphones to use with my Ipod Touch and Samsung Galaxy Player. On my Samsung Galaxy Player I purchased a Music app called PowerAmp that you can actually change the equalizer and bass and treble and these headphones sound Unbelieveable with it. The stock player was good but there was so much room for improvement. These are really easy to use and connect fast once you have it paired for the first time. You can walk quite a ways away from the player and still keep a good quality signal also. I highly recommend these for anyone wanted to really listen to music. Before these i had a cheap pair of headphones and now I'll never ever go back. N ... oise cancellinging is also a plus. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything
Cons: Nothing
My sisters bought the Dre Beats for my birthday and I been useing them for two months now on a daily basis and I love them I love how you can use them as bluetooth and if the battery dies I could just hook up the cord and use them.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
I love the fact that you can use it connected via bluetooth but also use a cable if they are not charged.
They also cancel a lot of noise for not being noise canceling.
It could have a little more base - I will need to compare it to the other models again to see if they have more.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review: This is the best earphones I've ever had so nice you can use wireless any device or pc works perfectly and you charge the batterys on the wall or pc, I use them like 2 hours a day and the battery resist like 5 days the sound is very clear if you are looking for a good headphone this is the one I enjoy so much, and also when you make a phone call you listen so clear and they hear u very well, thanks and enjoy it if you get it....

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: Very stylish, wireless, bass is on point
Cons: mids and lows are horrible, will get uncomftable after an hour of use, meant only for hip hop and R&B.
guys this pair of beats are over-priced for the type of sound quality they produce. I listen to music about 70% of the day even while i go to sleep and i used many types of head sets. SO these are pretty neat, they're wireless and if you don't have a bluetooth compatible device you can plug them to a ipod or whatever. HOWEVER, i do have the studio beats and unfortunately they sound better. These beats if you're listening to rock for example the music sounds muffled but the bass perfect. *******If you're into other music and not just Hip hop and R&B these will NOT be for you.********

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.ReviewTitle: The best of both worlds: sound and portability
Item.Review:
Pros: Sound quality and wireless feature (music/phone calls)
Cons: Price
Let's be honest. When selecting a pair of headphones, you have to ask yourself, "Do I want them to be lightweight and portable? Or do I want them to sound amazing?" Well, now you don't have to choose. These headphones have amazingly rich bass without having to feel like you are the cream inside an Oreo cookie (and look like one too!). The fact that they are Blu-tooth wireless gives them great range and clarity and allows you to use them at the gym without having to worry about snagging the wire, sending your iPod flying across the room. And the fact that you can make/receive phone calls with them is just an added bonus. The headphones themselves are very comfortable and do a great job of reducing the noi ... se around you. I can't wait to use them on my next flight! At $279, they are a little pricey. But I can't find anything I DON'T like about them. So overall, they are worth the price. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything.
Cons: Price.
Outstanding sound. And easy pairing. Just wish they didn't cost so much.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: Listening to music
Cons: Answering phone calls
Great headphones for travel. There is no cord to get caught on things.

Item.Item: Beats by Dr. Dre Black Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - 900-00009-01
Item.Review:
Pros: music and phone calls with out cords and corded if needed
